programme.desc: Brand new concept of a travelogue show! Hosts will be using a different perspectives and knowledge to show you the latest tourist spots to check in! PK

programme.title: Show Biz Ep1088
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: Show Biz Ep1089
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World Ep796
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef Ep3536
programme.desc: Stylish Man The Chef is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng and Genie Chuo, together with professional chef, James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. Stylish Man The Chef containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: Battle Tour - EastvsWest Ep4
programme.desc: It is more than just a food and travel show as it is a cultural journey. The program blends travel, cuisine, and culture, inviting viewers not only to taste but also to experience the stories, people, and places behind Taiwanese food and destinations. Through lively food challenges, scenic explorations, and authentic local encounters, the hosts bring audiences closer to Taiwans diverse flavors and vibrant traditions.

programme.title: Hot Door Night Ep2066
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: The Sound of Happiness Ep173
programme.desc: Wu is a senior police officer has always wanted a son to carry his family name and join the force. However, he and wife are bequeathed with four daughters! As a doting father, his chief objective is to help them find happiness in their marriages. In this charming drama, Wu & his wife become their daughters greatest haven, through the ups and downs they face as married women.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan Ep5211
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation.

programme.title: Far Far Away
programme.desc: A 28-year-old IT geek has only been in love once. Surprisingly, he ends up getting romantically involved with five different women this year and the one thing they have in common is that they all live in far flung areas of Hong Kong. After taking five intensive relationship courses within these 365 days, will he find the-one?

programme.title: Operation Mekong
programme.desc: After it is discovered that the drugs seized on the Chinese ships had been planted by the henchman of a notorious drug cartel leader named Naw Khar, the governments of Thailand, Laos, Myanmar and China launched a joint task force to apprehend the criminal by sending a band of elite narcotics officers to the Golden Triangle to uncover the truth.

programme.title: Ip Man 3
programme.desc: When some gangsters led by a ruthless American property developer force a school to sell their land, Ip Man fights to protect it. Subsequently, Ip Man is challenged by another Wing Chun master Zhang Tian Zhi for the Grandmaster title. Ip Man accepts the challenge for the sake of his family and disciples, and wins the duel for the title.

programme.title: Knockout
programme.desc: A former boxing champion and convict who has just been released from prison discovers that his wife has died and he is now a single parent. The situation is made worse with his daughter's diagnosis of leukaemia. In order to encourage his daughter and fulfil his promise of never giving up, he re-enters the boxing ring.

programme.title: Z Storm
programme.desc: ICAC Chief Officer Luk is on the case of a corrupt policeman but finds all key witnesses killed when he starts to discover some clues. As investigation continues, Luk uncovers the fraud scheme of an organized corrupt group involving the government's $15 billion 'Care Fund'. He must fight against them to keep Hong Kong corruption free.

programme.title: Remember What I Forgot
programme.desc: Struggling with Alzheimer's disease, Hong Kong film buff Kim relies on his brother to manage their appliance repair shop. Kim's quirky behaviour prompts producer Ginger to suspect that he may be a film critic trying to profit from harsh reviews. Posing as a friend, Ginger uncovers Kim's secrets and sorrows as she gets closer to him and his family.

programme.title: Endless Battle
programme.desc: This is a story about two brothers. The younger brother is a drug lord while the elder brother Zhong is a police officer in the Narcotics Bureau. Both are involved in a drug cartel's turf battle and during an escort mission, Zhong discovers his brother's hidden identity. This leads to an endless battle between good and evil.

programme.title: Treasure Hunt
programme.desc: A commercial director Peggy shoots an ad on a deserted island while some mysterious men with the treasure map are also there to hunt for the hidden Ming Dynasty treasures. However, the map is stolen by Star who lives on the island. Star and Peggy unveil the hidden treasures but end up being chased by the mysterious men

programme.title: Tales From The Occult: Body And Soul
programme.desc: This horror anthology series returns to feature three spooky crime stories about an ex-hair model, a cat lover and the love triangle between a dental nurse, a dentist and a chef. The stories depict their paths from obsession to madness, eventually tipping them over to the dark side of human nature.

programme.title: Love Never Ends
programme.desc: An empty-nest elderly man and a widowed elderly woman who collects scrap, meet unexpectedly and gradually develop feelings for each other. An elderly couple whose wife suffers from a serious illness, makes a living by selling scrap. Both these elderly couples fall deeply in love and prove that love never ends, even if there is no tomorrow!

programme.title: Man On The Edge
programme.desc: On the eve of the 1997 handover, violence is rampant with triad forces causing chaos in Hong Kong. The triad gang leader assigns his right-hand man Ah Lok to take charge of the drug trafficking business. However, Ah Lok turns out to be an undercover police officer who unveils a shocking political conspiracy during the investigation.

programme.title: Hk Lan Kwai Fong
programme.desc: Lee is the Production head of an advertising firm who tries to improve her team's performance by competing with Creative head Chan in the day and clubbing at Lan Kwai Fong for ideas at night. Lee runs into her ex-boyfriend before a big commercial shoot and drowns her sorrows drinking at Lan Kwai Fong, but finally picks herself up with Chan's help.

programme.title: Cloudy Mountain
programme.desc: When a decade-long tunnel project is about to complete, an earthquake strikes and leads to a series of subsidence and landslides. The tunnel and a nearby town are at stake. A retired soldier and his son step up to try and stop the disasters at source. Will the authority decide to blow up the tunnel to save the 160,000 people in town?

programme.title: Leio
programme.desc: An ex-singer Kao returns to his hometown for a funeral and takes part in a water drilling contest to save his drought-stricken hometown, as well as to win a million dollar cash prize. However, what Kao and other contestants do not realize is that there is a fierce and deadly beast lurking underground who wants to eat them all!

programme.title: Adventure Of The King
programme.desc: The Ming Emperor Zhengde flees the palace to see the world after his mother orders him to marry an ugly princess. He disguises as a commoner and escapes with his advisors, but a gambling mishap causes them to part ways and Zhengde lost all his money. Phoenix, the owner of Lung Fung Inn, takes him in out of pity, and thus begins his new adventure...

programme.title: Beyond The Sin
programme.desc: The only daughter of Inspector Yan is brutally murdered, and her classmate Wen is arrested. Believing the case closed, Yan leaves the police force. However, when more girls are killed after Wen's imprisonment, Yan begins to suspect the real killer is still at large and vows to find the truth.

programme.title: Ready O/r Rot
programme.desc: Guy and Heidi are finally getting married but pressure from Guy's mother creates much friction between them. Meanwhile, Grey Bear suspects his wife of cheating on him and Ken faces the biggest crisis of his life when Jessica accidentally gets pregnant. Can they eventually solve their relationship problems?

programme.title: Last Suspect
programme.desc: Lawyer Chen receives a mysterious call demanding her to defend a murder suspect after her daughter is kidnapped, and is told that she can only save her daughter by winning the case. As she starts investigation with the police and evidence emerges, Chen discovers the truth and reveals the mastermind. Can she rescue her daughter in time?

programme.title: My Best Bet
programme.desc: Gambling addict Jing vows to quit after marrying anti-gambling advocate Zheng. However, wealthy gambler Ian nurses a long-held grudge against Zheng over a past humiliation and exacts revenge by taking the couple's siblings hostage. To save them, Jing breaks her vow and alongside Zheng, faces Ian in a final gamble.

programme.title: WE12
programme.desc: An underground organization, The League of Kaito has been maintaining international order. While 12 elite members possess extraordinary skills and have worked independently for a period of time, they must rekindle their long-lost team spirit to accomplish a mission together to save the world from disaster.

programme.title: Beyond The Dream
programme.desc: Primary school teacher Lok is a recovering schizophrenic who falls in love with a young girl he first met. As he struggles to reveal his illness, Lok has a relapse and becomes delusional. Little does he know she is a mental health counsellor who has a hidden agenda. The pair develops a relationship that is beyond their wildest dreams.

programme.title: Love Punch
programme.desc: Talented boxer Jia Yang is caught in an underground fight to clear her father's debts. She loses her Olympic aspiration and vanishes from the boxing world. 10 years later, Coach Li Yue is determined to help her honour her father's wish by returning to the ring. As passion and obligation collide, can Jia Yang revive her abandoned boxing dream?

programme.title: I Fine Thank You Love You
programme.desc: Pleng, an English tutor, helps her student to pass a break up message in English to her boyfriend Gym. Gym knows nothing about English but wants to win back his girlfriend from the US, so he asks Pleng to teach him. Boorish and a slow learner, Gym makes many hilarious mistakes when learning English and ends up falling for Pleng.

programme.title: Someday Or One Day
programme.desc: The movie is a spin-off from the TV series of the same name. While Huang Yu Xuan mourns the death of her boyfriend, she receives a mysterious cassette player that allows her to travel back in time. She meets her boyfriend then again, but will she be able to change his destiny?

programme.title: We are Family
programme.desc: Struggling as an extra, Chi Kwong joins a rent-a-family company run by Carlos and aspiring actress Catherine, and rent themselves out as make-believe relatives. As they surrogate different families, they unravel the complexities of family relationships, forging deeper connections along the way.

programme.title: Europe Raiders
programme.desc: Mr Lin and Miss Wang are the two top bounty hunters in the business, and are searching for the destructive missile Hand of God to prove who is the better bounty hunter. They soon realize they are not the only ones after the missile. Will Lin and Wang put their differences aside and work together in search for the 'Hand of God'?

programme.title: My Best Bet
programme.desc: Gambling addict Jing vows to quit after marrying anti-gambling advocate Zheng. However, wealthy gambler Ian nurses a long-held grudge against Zheng over a past humiliation and exacts revenge by taking the couple's siblings hostage. To save them, Jing breaks her vow and alongside Zheng, faces Ian in a final gamble.

programme.title: American Dreams in China
programme.desc: During the economic reform period in the 80's, three undergraduates are brought together by a common ambition - to live the American dream.

programme.title: Schemes in Antiques
programme.desc: Despite his family's expertise in ancient Chinese relics, Xu Yuan becomes an electronics shop owner to distance himself from his disgraced family. However, when an antique is to be returned to China, Xu Yuan uncovers an ancient mystery and soon embarks on a journey that can finally restore his family's reputation but may also cost him his life.

programme.title: Marriage With A Liar
programme.desc: Kiki and her boyfriend of seven years, Sean, are to be married in a week but both cheated on each other three days before the wedding. Faced with each of their perfect 'partners', Kiki and Sean ignore their responsibilities to each other and choose to go their separate ways

programme.title: From Vegas To Macau
programme.desc: Chow Yun Fat stars as "Magic Hands" Ken, a legendary gambling maestro who is forced out of retirement when his daughter's safety is compromised by an international gambling mafia. In order to save her, Ken and his new protg Cool must work together to expose the evil mastermind by challenging him to a high stakes head-to-head battle of cards.

programme.title: The Bride With White Hair
programme.desc: As Wudang disciple Zhuo Yi Hang confronts the Demon Palace, he reunites with Lian Ni Shang, the woman who once saved him, and their love reignites. Lian, a disciple of the Demon Palace, endures torment to be with Zhuo but is shattered when he accidentally injures her. A fierce battle between good and evil unfolds!

programme.title: The Sparring Partner
programme.desc: Adapted from a sensational 2013 parricide in Hong Kong, a young man partners with his friend to murder and dismember his parents. Pleading not guilty, the defendants play the devil and idiot game, while the defense attorneys turn on each other. Meanwhile, heated debates emerge inside the jury room, where nine jurors grapple with the truth.

programme.title: Fast Fingers
programme.desc: After his release from prison, Uncle Bill returns to make a fortune with his past thieving partners. They continue to prey on the unsuspecting public, but are closely watched by the upright police chief, who happens to be the boyfriend of one of Uncle Bill's nieces!

programme.title: The Winged Tiger
programme.desc: If the two big villains Winged Tiger and Underworld King join forces, the martial arts world will be plunged into chaos. This evil union is set to occur with the marriage of the Underworld King's sister and the Winged Tiger. Can this dangerous duo be stopped before one says "I do"?

programme.title: Lady General Hua Mu-Lan
programme.desc: Mulan disguises herself as a male soldier to replace her aged father in a war against the barbarians. Her courage brings her victory in battles and she was promoted to a general. When Mulan returns home with glory, the chief commander asks her to marry his daughter, forcing Mulan to reveal her true identity.

programme.title: The Bells of Death
programme.desc: Wei Fu is an unremarkable woodcutter. However, when psychotic marauders killed his family and abducted his sister, he goes through vigorous martial arts training with an expert swordsman in order to exact revenge on the evildoers.

programme.title: Song Of Orchid Island
programme.desc: Dr. He moves to the remote Lanyu island off the coast of Taiwan to look for his long lost father, and starts to run a clinic curing islanders who are bitten by the fatal red worms there. He meets Ya Lan who works as a nurse in his clinic and falls in love with him. Things get vicious for Dr. He as a jealous islander plots to get rid of him

programme.title: Life Gamble
programme.desc: Martial arts master Yu has retired for years but is invited to join force with another master Tao to fight against the four famous thieves and retrieve the stolen Dragon Jade. However, Tao's real plan is to possess the treasure himself and kills Yu after he defeats the thieves...

programme.title: The Emperor and the Minister
programme.desc: The ingenious imperial scholar Liu Yung always embarrasses Emperor Chien Lung with his quick wit and gift of gab. The emperor purposely sets him up to solve the seemingly unsolvable. However, Liu Yung resolves it easily with wit and style and foils the emperor's plot once again.

programme.title: Man Of Iron
programme.desc: A fearless fighter, Chou Lian Huan has risen to power in Shanghai with his exceptional combat skills. He risks his life for hostess Shen Ju Fang and embarks on a series of fierce battles against the son of a notorious triad leader and his gang, ultimately becoming a scapegoat in the gang's deadly turf war.

programme.title: Till the End of Time
programme.desc: This is Jenny Hu's stunning debut as a struggling singer who tries to keep her career and marriage intact. This movie also includes seven memorable hit songs.

programme.title: King Eagle
programme.desc: A young swordman, King Eagle, unwillingly gets involved in the internal affairs of a powerful clan and becomes their target. He is saved by the female chief of the clan, Lin, and falls in love with her. However, Lin's sister is part of all evil plots and betrays her. Even so, Lin begs King Eagle not to harm her sister.

programme.title: Tales of Larceny
programme.desc: Connecting all the antics of bosses, monks, beggars, and thieves is the slippery and sinuous efforts of three pickpockets so adept at their chosen skill that they can even trick three beauties of their underwear without missing a step.

programme.title: The Protectors
programme.desc: Ling Hsiao and Kuan Wang Lung are two guard chiefs working for an old convoy master. Lung is secretly in love with Fang Yen, the master's granddaughter but Yen is attracted to Ling Hsiao instead. In order to win her back, Lung sets up a trap to steal the convoy and frames Ling Hsiao for it.

programme.title: The Proud Twins
programme.desc: Jiang Xiao Yu is separated from his twin brother as a baby after his parents are murdered. He is taken by a couple to Villains Valley and raised to be a villain by a host of outlaws. Jiang leaves the valley to explore the world when he grows up. Will he be able to avenge his parents and meet with his twin brother?

programme.title: River of Tears
programme.desc: Retired singer Fang lives happily with her husband and son. Tragedy happens when a man from her past returns to haunt her. In an ensuing struggle to free her from his clutches, her husband dies in a car accident. Blamed by her father-in-law for her husband's death, Fang gets chased out of the house and goes back to singing to make a living...

programme.title: The Heroic Ones
programme.desc: Set in the Tang Dynasty, the 13 adopted sons of Sha Tuo King are all renowned as royal warriors. David Chiang plays the 13th Prince, a powerful fighter whose prestigious status provokes jealously, leading to a gruesome family feud.

programme.title: The Tiger and the Widow
programme.desc: The Liu Chia-liang trained Hui Ying-hung was considered the top action martial arts female star in the 1980s. It is her martial arts abilities that Michelle Yeoh tries to emulate. In The Tiger and the Widow, Hui Ying-hung is somehow mixed up in a salt smuggling ring that stinks of missing persons and rotten dilemmas.

programme.title: The Kung-fu Instructor
programme.desc: Wong Yang is a famous martial artist who is forced to teach kung fu to the Mong Clan, an evil clan which is trying to destroy its nemesis, the Chow Clan. Chow Ping from the Chow Clan is a student of Wong's caught in the Mong's territory and as punishment, the Mong Clan wants to cut off Chow Ping's limbs. Wong steps in to defend his student.

programme.title: Sweet And Wild
programme.desc: Fang is a spunky young village girl who is not afraid to fight back against hooligans. She gets into trouble with the biggest hoodlum Tong when she foils his plans with a maid, causing Tong to plot a revenge. Luckily a man whom she is attracted to, Hai, comes in time to her rescue. Can they fight back?

programme.title: The Water Margin
programme.desc: This is a martial arts epic directed by Chang Cheh. In the Sung Dynasty, the government is run by corrupt officials, so Sung Jiang gathers 108 outlaws at Mount Liang and establishes a band of patriotic heroes to end the repression of brutal overlords.

programme.title: Moonlight Serenade
programme.desc: A sweet inn-keeper's daughter is witness to a perverted rape, leading to more danger than most romantic dramas can handle. Can her true love rescue her in time? For this movie, the moonlight serenade is the sound of suspense, leading to more danger than most romantic dramas can handle.

programme.title: The Sword Stained with Royal Blood
programme.desc: Adapted from Jin Yong's novel, the movie depicts the havoc breaking out in the martial arts world when a warrior on the run uncovers a sword, a training manual, a treasure map and a secret message on the body of a deceased martial arts master.

programme.title: The Pure and the Evil
programme.desc: Two teen girls, Rose and May, become close friends despite their different social backgrounds. The rich girl May moves to America but returns years later to see Rose, now a beauty queen and bar girl. Rose is immediately attracted to Fang's fianc and their relationship quickly deteriorates when Rose sets out to pursue him

programme.title: Demon of the Lute
programme.desc: Lute demon Chin Mo has reappeared in the world to wreak havoc. Hsiao Feng Ling is ordered to help find a special bow and arrows that can counter the demon. Only Chiao Yin knows the whereabouts of the weapon. Hsiao and her classmate Old Naughty set out on an arduous journey to find Chiao. After overcoming many obstacles, they catch Chin Mo's man trying to snatch the bow and manage to stop him in time....

programme.title: The Human Goddess
programme.desc: This is a love story between an alluring fairy, Seventh Sister, who comes down from heaven to experience life in 70's Hong Kong, and a man who is running a debt laden orphanage. A heartless tycoon plans to take over the orphanage for its land but has to deal with Seventh Sister's magical powers as she aims to protect it from falling into his hands!

programme.title: The Cave of Silken Web
programme.desc: In this third instalment of Shaw Brother's Journey to the West, Monk Tang San Zang is trapped by seven seductive spider spirits who are hell-bent on achieving immortality by eating him! Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing have to fight the spider spirits to rescue Monk Tang San Zang.

programme.title: The Villains
programme.desc: Hung is an orphan seeking help from her wealthy uncle who has two sons but only dotes on the younger son Feng, a playboy. Feng covets the beauty of Hung and rapes her but when she gets pregnant, Hung is wrongfully accused and gets sent off by her uncle to protect Feng. Will Feng be punished for his villainy?

programme.title: The Rebel Intruders
programme.desc: Thousands of displaced refugees rush to the southern towns to avoid the civil war in north China. Three such young men trained with martial arts skills become sworn brothers, and accidentally got involved in the battle of the rebel leaders in town when they save a refugee girl. Can they fight back against the rebel gangs?

programme.title: The Yellow Muffler
programme.desc: Japanese director Inoue Umetsugu takes on the glitzy world of nightclub performers in The Yellow Muffler. The film depicts the struggle of two singing sisters, Ching-ping (Irene Chen I-ling) and Pai-hung (Betty Ting Pei) and ends when they are cast in a new movie.

programme.title: The Fake Ghost Catchers
programme.desc: Huan Zhu's ghost seeks help from Fake Ghost Catchers Bao Tuo and Zhou Peng, after a jealous suitor's ghost seeks vengeance by murdering her and now targeting her sister. Together with actor Wu Shun Chao who possesses a supernatural talent, they unite to protect Huan Zhu's sister from both mortal and spectral threats.

programme.title: The Delinquent
programme.desc: This is a coming-of-age tale depicting the lower class Hong Kong troubled youths in the 1960s and the societal issues that they face. Wang Chung is a hotheaded and rebellious teen who is tempted by the dark side, and have to unfortunately pay a huge price for it.

programme.title: Legend of the Bat
programme.desc: It is rumoured that people can buy anything they desire on the mysterious Island of Bats so long as they have money. The charismatic swordsman Chu Liu Xiang and his friend travel to the island to seek answers but realize they are not the only ones who want to unveil the mystery of this place.

programme.title: Enchanting Shadow
programme.desc: A young scholar Ning spends the night in a creepy temple that is said to be haunted. He does not believe in the rumours, but soon meets a beautiful female ghost Nie. Nie is forced to stay in the temple to seduce young men for a powerful demon to feast on. Knowing Nie to be a kind ghost, Ning decides to help her escape from the demon's clutches.

programme.title: Super Inframan
programme.desc: Transformed from a young laboratory researcher, the thunderbolt-fisted Inframan must battle Princess Dragon Mom who wakes up from hibernation to conquer the earth with her army of mutant monsters.

programme.title: Return of the Phoenix
programme.desc: An imperial minister Cheng betroths his pretty younger daughter, Ye, to his friend's son, Mu. His wife however, refuses to let Ye marry before her elder daughter Yan, who is ugly and undesirable. Yan is asked to pretend as Ye to meet Mu but scares him away. A rich guy who likes Ye meanwhile pretends as Mu to attend the wedding...

programme.title: Five Shaolin Masters
programme.desc: The Qing court plots to kill all Shaolin disciples by burning down Shaolin Temple. This sudden fire killed almost everyone except for five disciples. To take revenge on the Qing court, the five of them train hard in different fighting styles to become The Five Shaolin Masters.

programme.title: Honey Bunny And The Secret Sun Palace S1 Ep1
programme.desc: A hilarious animal chase comedy about the secret life and adventures of a dog, a parrot and twin bobcats living with Ms Katkar

programme.desc: A prince and a commoner who are best friends keep having to thwart the plots of the prince's scheming, ambitious minister.

programme.desc: This high-octane, action-packed espionage thrill ride stars Vin Diesel as former extreme sports athlete Xander XXX Cage, notorious for his death-defying and law-flouting public stunts. He is being scouted by National Security Agency operative Augustus Gibbons (Samuel L. Jackson) for a dangerous covert mission. Gibbons and the NSA are facing a desperate situation in distant Prague, where their undercover operative has been killed by a gang of cutting-edge thugs calling themselves Anarchy 99, headed by the brutal ex-Russian Army commander Yorgi (Marton Csokas) and his beautiful but hardened girlfriend, Yelena (Asia Argento). Agent XXX will require all of his extreme skills to combat a clever, organized and ruthless enemy far beyond the scope of his experience.

programme.title: NCIS S22 Ep3
programme.desc: NCIS is called in to investigate when a lieutenant returns home on Halloween Eve to find a surprise party being thrown for someone else at his home.

programme.title: NCIS S22 Ep4
programme.desc: After receiving intelligence on deadly threats to multiple locations that could lead to a catastrophic war, NCIS is called in to try to neutralize the danger.

programme.title: NCIS S22 Ep5
programme.desc: NCIS works with the CIA to discover what secrets are being kept by Captain Butler, an elderly former spy with dementia.

programme.title: NCIS S22 Ep6
programme.desc: Things become tense when Knight is assigned to protect his wife after the home of a high-level defense contractor is attacked.

programme.title: NCIS S22 Ep7
programme.desc: Torres receives intel from a confidential informant regarding top secret naval information that's at risk of being sold.

programme.title: NCIS S22 Ep8
programme.desc: NCIS investigates a murder related to a car that begins driving on its own.

programme.title: NCIS S22 Ep9
programme.desc: When a shocking tell-all threatens to ruin Christmas for a decorated Marine, NCIS must unwrap the truth and deliver a holiday miracle -- before the book hits shelves and turns a hero's legacy into a holiday disaster.

programme.title: NCIS S22 Ep10
programme.desc: After NCIS learns that the owner of Parker's favorite bakery is being blackmailed, they hatch a plan to save her.

programme.title: NCIS S22 Ep11
programme.desc: NCIS stages a fake wedding for two of its own in an attempt to take down the mob.

programme.title: NCIS S22 Ep12
programme.desc: NCIS investigates the fatal poisoning of one of Kasie's forensic scientists. Meanwhile, McGee is questioned by the Pentagon regarding the contents of his book.

programme.title: NCIS S22 Ep13
programme.desc: NCIS investigates the case of a Navy lieutenant found dead at a blood donation bank. Also, McGee needs help from the team to raise money for his twins' school fundraiser.

programme.title: NCIS S22 Ep14
programme.desc: When Torres receives a text from Jimmy's daughter who has discovered a large sum of money near the naval library, the team works together to investigate.

programme.title: NCIS S22 Ep15
programme.desc: After a Navy Lieutenant's death reveals ties to Special Agent Sawyer (Zane Holtz), Torres and Knight uncover a murder linked to a wealthy family. Meanwhile, Parker discovers a shocking connection between his mother's death and Lily.

programme.title: NCIS S22 Ep16
programme.desc: A girls' night out takes an unexpected turn when NCIS is called to investigate the motive of a possible arsonist. Also, Torres struggles to find work/life balance.

programme.title: NCIS S22 Ep17
programme.desc: After NCIS captures the hitman known as 'The Poet,' the team races to uncover who ordered the assassination of a Navy Chief.

programme.title: NCIS S22 Ep18
programme.desc: When a trio of combat vets are found murdered in a D.C. motel room, NCIS tracks down a suspect who refuses to talk to anyone but Sam Hanna.

programme.title: NCIS S22 Ep19
programme.desc: McGee's career and credibility are on the line when he investigates the deputy director for corruption. Also, Torres and Knight receive some surprising news.

programme.title: NCIS S22 Ep20
programme.desc: As NCIS investigates a dangerous connection between the Nexus cartel and Parker's longtime nemesis, mob boss Carla Marino, the team uncovers a high-stakes plot involving stolen nuclear material. With time running out, Parker is forced into an uneasy alliance that could determine the fate of the operation - and his own future.

programme.title: Captain Phillips
programme.desc: Maersk Alabama, an unarmed US container ship, gets hijacked by Somali pirates, led by Abduwali Muse, en route to Kenya. The ship's captain and Muse soon are at the mercy of uncontrollable forces.

programme.title: Salt
programme.desc: Centers on a CIA officer who is fingered as a Russian sleeper spy. She eludes capture by superiors who are convinced she is out to assassinate the president. While trying to reunite with her family, she struggles to prove someone else is the traitor.

programme.title: Dragonheart: Battle For The Heartfire
programme.desc: Drago, a dragon who shares his heart with the king of Brittania, must find an heir to the throne when the king passes. But the potential heirs use their inherited dragon strength and fire power against each other to vie for the throne.

programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: A spacecraft transporting thousands of people to a distant colony planet has a malfunction in one of its sleep chambers. As a result, a single passenger is awakened 90 years before anyone else.

programme.title: The Man With The Iron Fists
programme.desc: RZA co-writes, directs, and stars in this genre-blending, hip-hop-infused kung fu film set in Hong Kong, featuring Russell Crowe, Lucy Liu, and produced by Quentin Tarantino.

programme.title: Hancock
programme.desc: A tortured superhero crash-lands in Sheepshead Bay, Brooklyn, and tries to revitalize himself by romancing an alluring housewife, causing chaos in the city.

programme.title: Jurassic World
programme.desc: A theme park showcasing genetically-engineered dinosaurs turns into a nightmare for its tourists when one of the dinosaurs escapes its enclosure. An ex-military animal expert steps up to save the day.

programme.title: Seattle Superstorm
programme.desc: When a massive storm threatens the Pacific Northwest, a family must find each other and work together to put a stop to the storm before it spreads beyond their control and annihilates the planet!

programme.title: Total Recall (1990)
programme.desc: In 2084, construction worker Douglas Quaid visits Rekall for a virtual Mars vacationbut the procedure unlocks hidden memories, thrusting him into a deadly rebellion and a secret-agent past.

programme.title: Anacondas: The Hunt For The Blood Orchid

programme.title: Ultraviolet

programme.title: Peter Rabbit

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 2
programme.desc: When the old-old-old-fashioned vampire Vlad arrives at the hotel for an impromptu family get-together, Hotel Transylvania is in for a collision of supernatural old-school and modern day cool.

programme.title: Collateral
programme.desc: A cab driver finds himself the hostage of an engaging contract killer as he makes his rounds from hit to hit during one night in LA. He must find a way to save both himself and one last victim.

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winter's War

programme.desc: A Las Vegas crew has just one night to finish a two-day job. Tackling several last-minute wedding cakes they've got no margin for error.

programme.title: Food Factory S5 Ep24
programme.desc: A mega fish order form Harvard university means an early start for a crew of fishermen.

programme.title: Mammals S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Forest - Sir David Attenborough reveals the world of mammals and the secrets of their success.

programme.title: Griff's Great American South S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Chattanooga & Nashville - The Solid South - Griff explores Tennessee's river power, atomic secrets, and Nashville's country music scene.

programme.title: Spectacular Earth S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Lightning - In Arizona, lightning strikes from so high above the ground, through such clear air, that it creates the perfect conditions for the most electrifying show on Earth.

programme.title: Life Below Zero S12 Ep12
programme.desc: 100 Miles from Nowhere - Alaskan residents look to restock their food supplies as spring brings longer days. This season, the hardy residents face fresh threats to their survival.

programme.title: Bugs That Rule The World S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Life Givers - Learn how bees, butterflies, moths, and other pollinators keep our fields and forests fruitful, and weigh what life would be like if these busy bugs vanished. Witness a mysterious butterfly pilgrimage and a moth's clever way of escaping hungry bats.

programme.title: Into The Wild India S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Land of the Secret Rhino - The grasslands of Northeast India are one of the most fertile habitats on earth. Hundreds of species of tall grass flourish here, allowing one of India's most iconic creatures to thrive the Greater One-horned Rhino.

programme.title: Into The Wild India S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Wild Stallions of the Himalayas - The Ladakh plateau is a land of extremes, but the Tibetan wild ass is the king of this grassland. Follow one stallion as he shadows a herd of females for his chance to sire the next generation, but in doing so, he must battle those wanting his crown!

programme.title: Into The Wild India S1 Ep4
programme.desc: A Sloth Bear's Dilemma - In a land of heat and tropical storms, life on the plains of southern India is tough. But Bibi, a female sloth bear with two cubs, is up for the challenge of her life as she fights against drought, food scarcity, and predators around every corner.

programme.title: Into The Wild India S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Rana: Queen of the Jungle - One of the most iconic animals on Earth stalks the jungles of India: the Bengal Tiger. Over the course of a single day, we follow the fortunes of one mother and her three young cubs. She must provide enough food for her family to stay alive.

programme.title: Into The Wild India S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Youngsters of the Desert - A young lion cub must survive as his family is torn apart, two adolescent leopard cubs must fend for themselves after they are abandoned, and a young adult blackbuck must risk life and limb as he tries to secure his first mating.

programme.title: Pridelands: Wilderness Reborn
programme.desc: An Australian family go on an adventure to restore an old hunting ranch in South Africa. Their goal is to rebuild the overgrown habitat, create an eco-tourism ranch, and allow the natural wildlife, including predators, to move back in.

programme.title: Pride Rules S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Einstein Must Go! - Get to know the Waterfront Pride: males Tom Tom and Caller, 8 lionesses, 10 youths, and Einstein, the grown cub who never left home. Watch Einstein's defiance catch up with him when rivals from the Outsiders Pride make a play that seals his fate.

programme.title: Pride Rules S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Adapt Or Die - Feel the heat when the pride tries to hunt down adequate food as drought conditions push them (and their prey) dangerously close to death. Watch Einstein adapt to solo life, then assess the damage after new mom Kalwezi fights for her cubs' lives.

programme.title: Pride Rules S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Hide and Seek - Contend with the challenges of the rainy season, which turns everything green and spoils the lions' camouflage. Watch Einstein fail to make new connections and weigh the pros and cons when Keeza and her cub are kidnapped by rival male Mad-Eye Moody.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters S3 Ep4
programme.desc: The Leopard Who Changed Her Spots - Meet pampered young leopardess Chipadzua, who has never had to hunt for food, thanks to her patient mother. Alone for the first time in her life, will she develop the skills it takes to survive?

programme.title: Africa's Hunters S3 Ep5
programme.desc: Deadly Rivals - Enter the world of a wild dog pack whose bountiful hunting grounds are threatened when a clan of spotted hyenas moves in nearby. The vulnerable pups start to go hungry as the scavenging rivals steal their food and eventually raid their den.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters S3 Ep6
programme.desc: Buffalo Showdown - To the lion, the buffalo is not only a satisfying dinner but also dangerous. Track a herd of 300 buffalo along with the Mwamba pride, who must act quickly and carefully if they are to take down their prey.

programme.title: Pridelands: Wilderness Reborn
programme.desc: An Australian family go on an adventure to restore an old hunting ranch in South Africa. Their goal is to rebuild the overgrown habitat, create an eco-tourism ranch, and allow the natural wildlife, including predators, to move back in.

programme.title: Pride Rules S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Einstein Must Go! - Get to know the Waterfront Pride: males Tom Tom and Caller, 8 lionesses, 10 youths, and Einstein, the grown cub who never left home. Watch Einstein's defiance catch up with him when rivals from the Outsiders Pride make a play that seals his fate.

programme.title: Pride Rules S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Adapt Or Die - Feel the heat when the pride tries to hunt down adequate food as drought conditions push them (and their prey) dangerously close to death. Watch Einstein adapt to solo life, then assess the damage after new mom Kalwezi fights for her cubs' lives.

programme.title: Pride Rules S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Hide and Seek - Contend with the challenges of the rainy season, which turns everything green and spoils the lions' camouflage. Watch Einstein fail to make new connections and weigh the pros and cons when Keeza and her cub are kidnapped by rival male Mad-Eye Moody.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters S3 Ep4
programme.desc: The Leopard Who Changed Her Spots - Meet pampered young leopardess Chipadzua, who has never had to hunt for food, thanks to her patient mother. Alone for the first time in her life, will she develop the skills it takes to survive?

programme.title: Africa's Hunters S3 Ep5
programme.desc: Deadly Rivals - Enter the world of a wild dog pack whose bountiful hunting grounds are threatened when a clan of spotted hyenas moves in nearby. The vulnerable pups start to go hungry as the scavenging rivals steal their food and eventually raid their den.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters S3 Ep6
programme.desc: Buffalo Showdown - To the lion, the buffalo is not only a satisfying dinner but also dangerous. Track a herd of 300 buffalo along with the Mwamba pride, who must act quickly and carefully if they are to take down their prey.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running With The Pack S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Big Cats, Big Trouble - Dodge a leopard with the Manzi dogs while they treat themselves to a stolen feast. No such luck for the Kakuli pack on the hunt, as they're foiled by a brave puku antelope. Find the stork pack, and retreat from charging elephants with Jules and Simon.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Dillas Surprise - Crash a fruit-flinging party celebrating the return of Jelapat, Talaken, Bawan, and Rona to the nursery to join the rest of their classmates. Meanwhile, flooding overtakes the pre-release islands, and injuries stifle the progress of two students.

programme.title: Zambia Untamed S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Outcasts - In the Luangwa Valley lies a grove of Ebony trees, home to a troop of baboons. But, there are dangers here - the resident leopard who, unlike the other predators, is powerful and agile enough to climb trees. He's not an easy foe to elude.

programme.title: Zambia Untamed S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Living on the Edge - The plains and woodlands of the Luangwa Valley are the wildest and most merciless of all neighborhoods where duels between predator and prey are played out both day and night. For the animals that call this home, it's a daily battle to stay alive.

programme.title: Zambia Untamed S1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Acacia Loop - As the dry season begins, thousands of animals are making their way to the Acacia Loop. Each must establish their place in the pecking order and avoid the dangerous residents who are all too willing to make a meal of the unwary.

programme.title: Zambia Untamed S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Mvula's Journey - Mvula is the youngest calf in the Madzi family. Temperatures are soaring. Lagoons and waterholes are drying up. This forces Mvula and his family to undertake a long and dangerous journey to the only remaining source of water: the Luangwa River.

programme.title: Bugs That Rule The World S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Eat Or Be Eaten - Go up against predatory insects that are tailor-made for killing. See why the terrifying praying mantis has the agility of a martial artist and an appetite for everything from flies to hummingbirds, then go hunting in mid-air with deadly dragonflies.

programme.title: Bugs That Rule The World S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Beetle Mania - Get a sanitation lesson from nature's original cleanup crew. Learn how beetles keep ecosystems in balance with clever biological weapons like tusks and toxic sprays, then see why the 6,000-plus species of dung beetles are the world's unsung heroes.

programme.title: Rewilding S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Hidden Gem of the North - Explore a biodiversity hotspot in the heart of northern Germany, where biologists engineered the return of tree frogs, mink, Ferruginous ducks, and osprey. Discover how the area may become a paradise for many rare animals once considered extinct.

programme.title: Rewilding S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Andalucia's Struggle - Investigate the animals that have been returned to this mosaic of extreme habitats in Spain. Then discover how small environmental changes can make big differences in the populations of many endangered species and give them a real chance to recover.

programme.title: Animal Empires S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Family - Every empire needs a succession plan. Making babies - and raising them - is crucial for every species to survive. In some social circles, it takes a village to raise a family. In others, a single parent is all that stands between the vulnerability of youth and the threats of the wild.

programme.title: Animal Empires S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Rebuilding an Empire - Over the course of recorded time, many species have been threatened with extinction. Once-powerful animal empires - like the dinosaurs - have been completely wiped from the planet. But others once on the verge of disappearance have survived, bounced back, and even reclaimed their kingdoms.

programme.title: Animal Empires S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Animals Gone Wild - As the popular characters of songs and stories, farm animals are celebrated all over the world. But few stories tell of their sister species who live in the wild. These animals known primarily as livestock, beasts of burden, or even pets must fend for themselves beyond the fences of their domesticated kin.

programme.title: Wild Sky S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Africa - Observe the eternal search for water that defines the lives of Africa's wild animals. Witness the biggest marine feeding frenzy on Earth, see how cobras stock up on solar power, and join wildebeest herds and elephant clans on their epic migrations.

programme.title: Wild Sky S1 Ep4
programme.desc: South America - Learn how South America's rich diversity of weather fuels an even richer diversity of life. Examine the Amazon rainforest's oxygen-breathing trees, follow the arc of a vast cloud river, and meet flamingos that thrive in the sun's scorching UV rays.

programme.title: Airborne S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Catching Air - Watch beginners make their first leap into the air, like an Andean condor who must attend flight school before spreading its wings. Meet oddballs who soar without feathers and marvel at a peregrine falcon's speed as it dives to catch its prey.

programme.title: Airborne S1 Ep2
programme.desc: In Flight Meals - Go hunting with flyers who excel at making mid-air catches. Watch the metamorphosis of the acrobatic emperor dragonfly, admire the barn owl's stealthy approach to prey, and catch a wandering salamander's death-defying leap into the abyss.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Enchanted Forests S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Mountains - Climb into a realm of thin air and towering rock. Tag along as mythical monkeys battle for a winter food stash, sing along with lemurs in a fruit-filled tree canopy, and watch an aromatic tree bring together blossom and possum in a moonlit tryst.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Enchanted Forests S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Boreal - Travel to the Arctic for a peek at the brutal challenges of life in the boreal forest, then admire some stellar animal adaptations. Witness a secret reindeer superpower, navigate a rodent labyrinth of snow, and learn why moose are gourmets at heart.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Enchanted Forests S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Extreme - Learn how plants and animals tough it out in some of the driest terrain Earth has to offer. Run across thirsty trees that act as elephant signposts, see insects team up with plants for a chance at life, and get insight into natural chemical warfare.

programme.title: Wild Sky S1 Ep3

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running With The Pack S1 Ep5
programme.desc: The Lost Boy - Film a wild dog hunt with Julz as he catches up with the Manzi pack at a kill, and watch for leopards and hyenas as the Kakuli pack takes great risks while waiting for the rains to come. Go on an epic hunt with a returning male of the Stork Colony.

programme.title: Coral City S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Spring - Discover the most fantastic city of them all lying beneath the waves, where romance and migratory commuters flood the coral reef's main highways. Follow a green sea turtle looking for love and sit in with a cassowary dad tending his newborn chicks.

programme.title: Coral City S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Summer - Feel the heat of summer's arrival as supersize sea snails try to fend off an invading gang of coral-hungry starfish. Accompany reef sharks as they prowl for a midnight meal and marvel at the slippery disguise a parrotfish uses to survive the night.

programme.title: Pride Rules S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Adapt Or Die - Feel the heat when the pride tries to hunt down adequate food as drought conditions push them (and their prey) dangerously close to death. Watch Einstein adapt to solo life, then assess the damage after new mom Kalwezi fights for her cubs' lives.

programme.title: Carpathian Predators S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Realm of the Bear - Join a mother brown bear as she struggles to find food for her two young cubs while teaching them essential skills for the harsh winter ahead. Then visit a pair of tiny lynx kittens as they begin to venture away from the safety of their den.

programme.title: Carpathian Predators S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Realm of the Wolf - In the remote wilderness of the Carpathian Mountains lives an elusive predator that has inspired awe and fear throughout history: the Eurasian wolf. Discover the vital role that these once-misunderstood hunters play in protecting their ecosystem.

programme.title: Into The Wild India S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Rajan Monkey on a Mission - Rajan is the powerful alpha male who sits at the head of an unusually large troop. He has done well to sustain such a big group, but the future doesn't look so bright. There are more mouths to feed, and yet his jungle home is shrinking.

programme.title: Animal Empires S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Infestation - Uninvited guests. Using sheer numbers to claim a territory, some animal groups are considered pests. But their very survival may depend on finding a home where they're not welcome.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Hush, Little Baby - When Frederic Estes tries to get babies banned from the local library, the babies fight back in a war for story time

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business S1 Ep18
programme.desc: Night of the Frodarg - On a dark and stormy night, Tim's fears of a local legend and Boss Baby's fear of a PuppyCo agent force the brothers to unite to stay safe as the house is infiltrated

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep21
programme.desc: Cold Open - Tom and the riders discover the Ice Realm and find Buzzsaw inside.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep22
programme.desc: Uncharted Territory - Alex and Eugene find themselves at odds with Tom and their fellow dragon riders when Feathers and Webmaster go missing during a blizzard in the Ice Realm.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny S1 Ep17
programme.desc: The Beast of the Wasteland - Po and the Kids are once more waylaid, this time by Mole Rats who have deemed Bao their god. But when Bao isn't able to defeat the mythical creature plaguing the Wasteland, Fan Tong steps up to save the day.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny S1 Ep18
programme.desc: Danger in the Forbidden City - Po and the Kids finally arrive in the Forbidden City. After an assassination scare, Xiao enlists Po and the 4Cs for help protecting her during her father's funeral.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Moles - Jack Sprat and Puss journey underground in search of treasure and discovery a kingdom of moles led by a rather bizarre king.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S1 Ep18
programme.desc: Mermaid - To prove he's a ladies' man, Puss rescues a mermaid, who instantly falls in love with him and becomes his worst nightmare

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City S1 Ep17
programme.desc: We Meat Again - After their intense battle against Mr. Lung, the Creature Brigade disbands, leaving Yi and Everest as the remaining creature helpers. But thanks to an inert - but magical - chunk of meat called Taisui that falls from the sky, Yi finds herself caught in a time loop, forcing her to return the meat to its rightful home before sundown. Meanwhile, Jin and Peng end up on their own creature mission of sorts. Eventually the crew reunites, and together they are able to return Taisui and end the loop.

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City S1 Ep18
programme.desc: A Hair-ifying Night - Our crew heads out of the city to reconnect with nature at a once-popular campsite, now deserted and in ruins owing to the urban legend of Yeren: a huge, hairy man who escaped from clown school as the tale goes. After some campfire spookiness, the crew comes face-to-face with the actual Yeren, who turns out to be a benevolent, camouflaging creature. The crew and Yeren team up to rejuvenate the campsite and keep it from being shut down.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep25
programme.desc: Kitty Fairy Gets Sick - When Gabby unboxes a recipe for dandelion soup and a soup bowl, she discovers Kitty Fairy is sick! Gabby and Pandy make her some delicious dandelion soup and while she rests, they take care of her Garden. With the help of all the Gabby Cats, they water the Singing Flowers, help the Rainbow Kitty Bushes regain their color, and sing some fussy Itty Bitty Blossoms a lullaby. For our Gabby Cat of the Day segment, Kitty Fairy sings a song!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Spaceship - The dollhouse delivery is a spaceship that takes off with a sleeping CatRat inside! Gabby, Pandy, and Kitty Fairy have to get the ship back into The Fairy Tail Garden before Floyd (who thinks it's the best kitty toy ever!) gets his paws on it!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Gabby Gets The Hiccups - The dollhouse delivery is a cat-in-the-box that startles Gabby, giving her the hiccups. Dr. Pandy and the Gabby Cats try several cures, but it isn't until CatRat scares the hiccups out of Gabby that they go away!

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep18
programme.desc: Phil's Fun Farm - When Phil learns no one on the farm thinks he's fun, he sets out to prove them all wrong... by building a crazy amusement park.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Joy Story - When Eep and Dawn find a stranded egg, they eagerly take it in as their new pet, but when they learn the egg is not what it seems, they have to return it before it becomes dangerous.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep20
programme.desc: The Big Shine - When Grug overhears Thunk accidentally call Phil "Dad", he tries to reconnect with Thunk by taking him to the natural spectacle known as "Big Shine."

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Dragon Club - Tom and Jun take a risk in revealing the secret of the Hidden Realm to D'Angelo to aid an injured dragon, and D'Angelo bonds with Plowhorn.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Featherhide - Tom and the others debate how to keep the dragons a secret, even as a rambunctious young cloaking dragon gets loose in town and pursues a friendship with a reluctant Alex.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Fault Ripper - Tom and the Riders try to save ICARIS when it's revealed to be in danger from a monstrous dragon.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Flustering Mindless Woe of the Flushable Memory Wipes - After being made fun of for sitting in chocolate pudding, George and Harold go into hiding only to come back to find that everybody has forgotten who they are

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Soggy Salvation of the Swirling Sweatnami - Tired of mean Mr. Krupp, the boys go back in time to prevent him from becoming a bully, but discover that their plan has backfired when they return to the present

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Sickening Fumes of Smartsy Fartsy - In order to retrieve Mr. Krupp's locked up rule book, George and Harold use an invention that ends up turning against them

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 Ep22
programme.desc: Lucky And The Train Tycoon - While Lucky is eager to celebrate her first birthday on the frontier, a surprise visit from her Grandpa stirs up a controversy.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Cat's in the Cradle - When an unexpected kitten shows up on Boss Baby's doorstep, they go head to head against the feline enemy

programme.title: All Hail King Julien S1 Ep10
programme.desc: One More Cup - Julien finds a bag of coffee beans in the Cove of Wonders and gets the entire lemur community hooked on caffeine.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Gran Day Out - When Gran moves into the cave with The Croods, she drives Grug nuts and embarrasses Eep in front of the first-ever group of cool kids.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Enter the Dragon Master - After absorbing the mystical Hero Chi of the Four Constellations, four panda kids enlist the Dragon Master to teach them Kung Fu

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Hidden - Puss stumbles upon the legendary hidden city of San Lorenzo, and soon finds himself forced to protect it from thieves.

programme.desc: Lucky And The Train Tycoon - While Lucky is eager to celebrate her first birthday on the frontier, a surprise visit from her Grandpa stirs up a controversy.

programme.title: Dinotrux Supercharged S3 Ep65
programme.desc: Bad Build - When the Dinotruxs own talents are used against them Ty realizes that truxing it up may not always be the best plan

programme.title: Dinotrux S3 Ep66
programme.desc: Renegades - Half dinosaur! Half construction truck! Full-on fun! Watch giant Ty Rux, his little buddy Revvit and the crew come face-to-face with evil D-Structs.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Karmageddon , Chet Gets Burned - Turbo is excited to race on a freeway that is closed for construction, but he needs to complete a series of favors for the crew before he can go. Burn breaks up with Chet after he forgets her birthday. To make Burn jealous, Turbo dresses up as a girl and pretends to be Chet's new girlfriend.

programme.title: Turbo F.a.s.t. S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Gypsy Moth Prophecies , Skidzo-Brainia - A fortune-telling moth forecasts doom for Whiplash and though Whip is skeptical, the crew tries to keep him safe so the it doesn't come true. Skidmark learns the crew is tired of his crazy behavior so he invents a helmet that changes his personality in unpredictable ways.

programme.title: Where's Wally? S2 Ep27
programme.desc: Big in Japan - Wally and Wenda travel to Tokyo for a Manga festival and meet up with Koichi, fellow Wanderer and Go Hero Go fan. But when Fritz is accidentally zapped by the Mega Mega Monster key, he grows to the size of Godzilla and tries to eat all the noodles in the city. The wanderers must stop him and get the key back.

programme.title: Where's Wally? S2 Ep28
programme.desc: Where's Woof? - When Woof disappears into the magic suitcase, Wally and Wenda launch an international search for their happily wandering puppy. Our favorite Wanderers from around the world return to help our heroes find Woof in this globetrotting adventure.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots S3 Ep106
programme.desc: Dandelions - The twins inadvertently ruin Fifi's garden while playing a game. Can they and the other tots make it better before Fifi finds out?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots S3 Ep107
programme.desc: Come And Play Slugsy - Stingo has dispatched Slugsy to steal Fifi's jelly. Slugsy starts to play with the twins and forgets what he set out to do, much to Stingo's wrath!

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Rupert and the Rainbow - It's a colourful Nutwood when Rupert and Ping Pong try to use the Rainbow to paint pictures with.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Rupert and the Toy Soldiers - When Ping Pong's spell to fix a broken toy Soldier goes wrong Rupert and his friends need help from an unexpected source to get him back in the box.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales S1 Ep41
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Parrot was the best keeper of secrets in the whole of Tinga Tinga. Infact Parrot couldn't open his beak at all! Then one day some beast dares to steal Lion's mane and Parrot sees the whole thing! But how is going to tell Lion?! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales S1 Ep42
programme.desc: Why Bushbaby Has Big Eyes - You see there was a time when Bushbaby didn't have big eyes. She had tiny little eyes and she was always getting lost. Strange things begin to happen and there are stories that Majitu the Great Giant has returned to Tinga Tinga. Young Bushbaby doesn't believe a word of it... and convinces the other animals that Majitu the Giant does not exist. "If you can't see him, he's not real". But then she does see the Giant and her eyes grow big as planets. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep19
programme.desc: The Dollhouse Hotel - When Gabby unboxes a suitcase and a hotel brochure, it's time to take a trip to The Dollhouse Hotel! Hotel guests Gabby and Pandy check in with the Hotel Manager DJ Catnip then go to Mercat's Spa and even order room service from Pillow Cat! For our Gabby Cat of the Day Segment, Pillow Cat sings a song!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep20
programme.desc: A Knight's Tail - Huzzah! Gabby the Bold and Pandy the Purr-owd are Knights in Training, and they head into the dollhouse for the Royal Knighting Ceremony. But it turns out that someone's locked King Catnip in the tower and without him they'll have to cancel the Royal Knighting Ceremony! It's up to the Knights in Training to solve the mystery and save King Catnip by performing acts of knighthood. For our Cat of the Day, Pandy makes a shield craft!

programme.desc: El Apasionado Negocio de la Niera - Frederic makes a play to take over the town's babysitters by instituting "senior sitting"

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Journey to the Snowcano - Jun struggles to convince Tom to trust her faith in myths over the Book of Dragons when they venture to a place that his book seems to say is extremely dangerous.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep24
programme.desc: The Decoy - Tom's leadership abilities come into question by Eugene when his decisions lead to failure while attempting to confront Buzzsaw.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny S1 Ep19
programme.desc: The Battle(s) of Gongmen Bay - Po and the Kids agree to escort a dirigible shipment of food to a drought-torn region of China. But Nu Hai has some suspicions about Shi Long, which she finds aren't far off when she discovers the dirigible is set to explode...with them on board!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Gongmen City Hustle - Po and the Kids make it to Gongmen City in search of the contact they heard has some info on the dirigible crash. Meanwhile, Xiao, mourning the presumed death of her new panda friends, takes off into the woods and meets a new friend.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Bees - Puss is terrified by an invasion by a swarm of bees, which only the hippy-like Piper can control with her magic flute.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Squad - Just as Puss is training the orphans to protect San Lorenzo, El Moco storms into town and cat-naps the swashbuckling hero.

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Please Hold for the Next Representative - Yi and the crew are overrun with pings from humans who are frustrated by creatures they now live alongside. Just when they think they've solved one issue, another springs up - and then that original one pops up again too! Meanwhile, we see an ominous pedestal of light progressively become more cracked with each fraught human-creature relationship. At her wits' end, Yi accidentally hurts Peng, Jin, and Everest with her magic. She then notices Everest fading into nothing

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Please Hold While We Connect You - In the wake of the previous episode, the magical creatures have all vanished and the world at large has gone gray. Desperate to fix things, the crew travels to the Magical Realm to confront the omniscient Great Watcher, who was a tempting offer for Yi. The kids manage to retrieve creatures, but being back in the human world is sapping them of their magical energy. Feeling responsible, Yi embarks on a dangerous mission to save everyone - but it's the community of creatures and humans alike that instead come to Yi's rescue. Together, they realize that their connections to one another are the most powerful magic of all.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Hamster Kitties - When 6 adorable hamster kitties get loose in the dollhouse, Gabby, Pandy and Baby Box head out to look for them. Along the way, Baby Box learns a lot about hamster kitties, which convinces Mama Box to let them live in the Craft Room.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Kitty School - When Gabby unboxes a school notebook and lunch box, it's Kitty School Day in the dollhouse! Gabby and Pandy head to different classes held by the Gabby Cats to learn and live a day in the life of a student.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Kitty Cat Cam - When Gabby unboxes a new camera that takes pictures with silly filters, CatRat uses it to lead Gabby, Pandy, and the Gabby Cats on a photographic scavenger hunt around the dollhouse!

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Thunder Misters - Jealous of the Thunder Sisters, the men on the farm undergo a series of difficult initiation rituals to try and join the exclusive tribe of women.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Eep loves action and adventure - it's in her blood. But when Eep starts adventuring in her sleep, she has to try to find the cause of her new sleep walking to avoid ending up in dangerous situations.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep16
programme.desc: The Gorgwatch Project - After Thunk and Guy tell Eep and Dawn a campfire story of Gorgwatch, a hideous monster who roams the woods, the girls are terrified. After a sleepless night, Guy and Thunk assure the girls it's just a made up story. Dawn and Eep are relieved until they find proof that Gorgwatch is real... and he's coming for them.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Uniconned - Jun breaks the rules by sneaking a small, adorable dragon out of the Crystal Realm and bringing it home, but finds that her older brother, Eugene, has arrived and watches her every move.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Magma Breather - Tom has to keep his mom, Olivia, distracted while Jun, Alex, and D'Angelo use a new dragon to close off a cave leading to the Crystal Realm, and prevent her from discovering the dragons.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Dragons of the Undead - When Feather is taken by a group of what appear to be zombie dragons, Alex finds her inner hero and rescues her friend.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Troublesome Treachery of the Thieving Toot Fairy - George and Harold race against Mr. Krupp to try to get him fired before they get expelled

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Tenuous Takedown of the Tyrannical Teachertrons - In the season opener, George and Harold have returned to school due to a technicality, but the school has been taken over by Melvin and a cyborg Melvin from the future! Their goal is to make the school extremely difficult by replacing all the teachers with Teachertron robots. Suffering under the new regime and without Mr. Krupp/Captain Underpants on hand to help, the boys hypnotize gym teacher Mr. Meaner and turn him into Sergeant Boxers to fight back.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Frantic Fury of the Fearsome Furculees - Tired of the Melvins ruling the school, the boys realize that they need Mr. Krupp to make the school at least bearable. Unfortunately, Krupp has run off to Ecuador to look for a fabled fountain. So the boys form the M.I.S.F.A.R.T.S. - Mega Incredible Search Force Adventure Rescue Team Squad - to travel to Ecuador and bring Krupp back, whether he wants it or not.
