programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep125
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Parking Garage / The Crew Builds A Campsite - The Crew helps with a parking problem when Caf Carl's ice cream machine brings lots of cars to Builder Cove. When Rubble's fear of the dark derails the pup's Bark Yard campout, the Crew comes up with an idea to help him enjoy the starry night.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S3 Ep305
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Giant Ice Cream Maker - Rubble and the pups help Cafe Carl make enough ice cream for everyone! If Speed Meister doesn't get in the way...

programme.title: DORA S3 Ep312
programme.desc: Abuela's Quinceaera / Story Time - Dora finds out that her Abuela never had a quincea?era and throws her a super-secret surprise party with a special dress, tiara, and shoes! Dora's friend Coco doesn't have a story for Story Time, so they go to the Tall Tale Tree in search of one!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S6 Ep608
programme.desc: The Puppy Chase! - When a big bubble floats away with Gabby's new puppy, she'll team up with Blaze and AJ to get him back.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S2 Ep226
programme.desc: The Mountain Eater / The First Day Of School - Barbapapa tells the Barbababies about his extraordinary encounter with a wolf. Tomorrow is the Barbababies' first day of school.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep101
programme.desc: The Barbapapa Tree / The Barbababies' Birthday - Barbapapa and Barbamama return to the tree they were born under. It's in bad condition. They must rescue it quickly without disturbing the nearby animals. It's the Barbababies's birthday. They all want to do something different with Barbapapa!

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space S1 Ep101
programme.desc: Shooting Star / Ball / Balloon - Tim, Tommy, Tia and Dad get stuck on a remote asteroid. Tim, Kai and Tommy try to get their ball back from Mum's bedroom. Tia's new balloon gets stuck in a tree, so Tim tries to get it down.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S3 Ep314
programme.desc: Pups Save a Robosaurus / Pups Save a Film Festival - When a homemade Robotic Dino named Earl comes to life, the pups need to find him, stop him, and bring him home. The pups are shooting their Film Festival entry until Daring Danny X cuts the action with his dangerous stunt.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S6 Ep626
programme.desc: Pups Save a Tour Bus - Mayor Humdinger's tour bus goes out of control when he tries to bring tourists to Foggy Bottom! PAW Patrol to the rescue!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep108
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Popcorn Caf / The Crew Fixes A Slippery Mess - Rubble & Crew switch to cleanup mode when construction on Caf Carl's new popcorn restaurant pops out of control. A soapy accident causes slippery mayhem all over Builder Cove. Can the pups clean it up in time for Mayor Greatway's big jump?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep203
programme.desc: Mysteries - The family is watching Detective Potato on TV. Peppa and George want to be detectives too. So,Daddy Pig gives them a mystery to solve. Teddy is hidden and Peppa and George use a magnifying glass to follow a trail of cake crumbs to solve the mystery

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep125
programme.desc: Not Very Well - Peppa has chicken pox, and has to stay in bed until she gets better.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep127
programme.desc: Windy Castle - Peppa and her family go to the Windy Castle, and when they get there, they have a wonderful view from the top.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep128
programme.desc: My Cousin Chlo - Peppa and George's cousin Chloe comes to their house. Peppa tries to show Chloe that she is a big girl, but it is very hard.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep129
programme.desc: Pancakes - Mummy Pig makes pancakes, and Peppa and George help, but Daddy Pig flips his pancake so high it sticks to the ceiling.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep130
programme.desc: Babysitting - Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig look after Peppa and George while Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig go out for the evening. Peppa and George are too excited to sleep and Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig play games with them to tire them out.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep115
programme.desc: The Fuchsia Ocean / Zero Waste - Chemical sprays are making the countryside rosy! The Barbapapas' build an aviary to protect sick birds. When they see a beach covered with rubbish, the Barbapapa family decides to clean the beach and use the trash to make a miniature golf course.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S2 Ep219
programme.desc: Barbascience - But who are the Barbapapa?

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space S1 Ep102
programme.desc: Present / Movie / Vinny - Tim, Tommy and Tia can't decide on the best gift for Grandma. Tim tries to make his own Captain DinoStar movie. Tim fakes it to prove he's just as cool as Kai's cousin.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S1 Ep110
programme.desc: Truckball Team-Up - Blaze discovers an exciting new sport called Truckball. But when Crusher and his team of cronies challenge him, Blaze must scour all of Axle City to put together a Truckball team before the big game.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S9 Ep901
programme.desc: Liberty Makes a New Friend / Pups Save the Pup Pup Boogie Contest - Liberty mistakenly brings a bear into town, thinking it's someone's pet. She must fix her mistake and rescue Chickaletta. Francois' hot-air balloon goes out of control before the Pup Pup Boogie Contest. The Pups, with Liberty, race to the rescue.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S11 Ep1105
programme.desc: Pups Save the Director / Pups Save the Super Cows - Francois is directing a video about Mr. Porter's new line of pies. Winnie Winnington's cow competitor Mooo-na Lisa and Bettina run away disguised as super heroes during the Super Farm Fair.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S2 Ep218
programme.desc: The Crew Raises A Runway/ The Crew Builds A Giant Skateboard - When Buttons the deer needs to cross the Builder Cove airport's runway, Rubble & Crew know just what to build Rubble & Crew build a supersized skateboard for Auntie Crane and River's show. But when it rolls out of control, the pups lead the chase!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S2 Ep220
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Post Office / The Crew Builds A Super Farm Animal Wash - Builder Cove needs a post office! But when construction gets squirrely, it's up to the pups to find a construction solution. Rubble & Crew use their construction skills to convert the super car wash and clean Farmer Zoe's sticky farm animals.

programme.title: DORA S2 Ep210
programme.desc: Too Many Swipers / Bateo's Home Run - Dora and Boots help Swiper re-join with his duplicates and make it to Grandma's picnic. / Dora and Boots help Bateo the Bat get to the baseball game in time to play.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep121
programme.desc: Shark Prank / Lagoon Lemonade - Baby and William have to think outside the box in order to prank the ultimate prank master... Grandma Shark. When a heatwave strikes, Baby and William supply the town with Grandpa's world famous Lemonade.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep9
programme.desc: The Diary Badge - The Squirrels find a dusty, old book behind a cupboard... it's Duggee's diary from when he was a teenager! The Squirrels are keen to write diaries of their own.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep10
programme.desc: The Metal Detector Badge - Roly needs a wee, but the door is locked and Duggee has mislaid the key. Not to worry, Duggee has his metal detector.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep11
programme.desc: The Cheerleading Badge - The Squirrels find Duggee's cheerleader pompoms, so he shows them his old moves. Time to practice: Duggee at the chess board, the Squirrels as a squad. There's a big match ahead...

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Potato Time - At Squirrel Club, Duggee forgets how to woof, Duggly comes to visit, Roly celebrates Potato Time, and Billy teaches everyone the Bugatron dance!

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Song of Peace - Betty recalls the first time she pushed the red button, the Squirrels explore a range of emotions with Happy, Angry Bull tells a not-so-sleepy bedtime story, and the gerbils sing.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Squirrel Babies - Spring has sprung! There are cute baby animals to meet and frolic with.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep30
programme.desc: Turtle Boy - Bingo finds a toy turtle at the playground and wants to take him home, but Dad says it's not the right thing to do.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep31
programme.desc: Onesies - When mum's sister Brandy comes over for a visit, she brings the kids onesies as a present, which has an unexpected effect on Bingo.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep32
programme.desc: Tradies - Bluey and Bingo hide under the house and spy on two mysterious tradies working in the backyard, wondering what they're up to.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep104
programme.desc: Join In - The Teletubbies have their favourite things and The Noo-Noo wants to join in. When the Tubby Phone rings, the Teletubbies and The Noo-Noo do the Tubby Phone Dance together.

programme.title: Teletubbies Ready Steady Go! S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Let's Do The Tubby - Join the dance party with the Teletubbies! Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po dance and sing and "Do the Tubby!".

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep41
programme.desc: Fairy Tale Trail - Zip and the friends are going on a fairy tale scavenger hunt. But when Zip becomes unsure about the clues, will the friends still get their magical fairy tale prize?

programme.title: Dog Loves Books S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Dog Loves Heroes - Dog and Pug meet two hapless superheroes trying to outdo each other to save the city.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep52
programme.desc: Tick Tock Messy - Messy goes to OKIDO to play with Zim and Zam's new discovery, but will he and his friends get back from this adventure in time?

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Glow Messy - When the OKIDO lighthouse breaks down, Messy, Felix, Zoe and Zoom travel to Mystery Mountain in search of a light that never goes out.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep43
programme.desc: Fix It Mum and Dad - Monty believes that parents can fix everything, until he is told by his parents that they cannot fix his toy helicopter.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S3 Ep12
programme.desc: It's Time to Visit a Castle - JoJo and Gran Gran visit a ruined castle near the beach. JoJo imagines what the castle looked like before it was a ruin and finds it's just like being on a Captain Chloe adventure!

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S3 Ep11
programme.desc: It's Time For An Easter Feast - JoJo, Gran Gran and all the family plan an Easter feast. When there isn't enough space in the kitchen to prepare the food, it's time for a Gran Gran plan outside in the garden.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep23
programme.desc: Extra Bounce - John's yellow bouncy ball is too bouncy, but Sarah thinks she knows where the solution can be found...

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep24
programme.desc: Cake Relocate - Cake is tired of living in the fridge, so Sarah & Duck help him think about where else he would like to stay.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S23 Ep4
programme.desc: Panicky Percy - Percy causes confusion for everyone and prompts delays, when he spends too much time panicking over nothing.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep27
programme.desc: Seesaw - Dad has rudely plonked himself on one end of the seesaw. So Bluey and Bingo round up the entire playground to help move him off, but they still need to find one more friend.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep28
programme.desc: Movies - It's Bluey's first trip to the cinema, but she's worried the movie will be too scary. When Bingo starts running amok in the theatre, she must conquer her fear and help Dad out.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep29
programme.desc: Library - When Muffin is told that she is special by her dad, she interprets it as an excuse to do anything she wants, which means playing Bluey and Bingo's game of library her way.

programme.title: Supertato S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Ahoy Captain Pak Choi - Supertato and Broccoli go on a pirate adventure with Captain Pak Choi, but they don't realise she intends on plundering Evil Pea's freezer and stealing all her shiny things.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep40
programme.desc: The Wedding Badge - King Tiger has met his perfect partner and he is getting married. It's going to be a royal wedding!! The squirrels are to be special Guests of Honour, but who is King Tiger marrying!?

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep41
programme.desc: The Grandparents Badge - Duggee and the squirrels are tidying up - its Bring your Grandparents to Squirrel Club Day. Duggee has his Grandparents badge so he knows what they will like, a nice cup of tea.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Potato Time - At Squirrel Club, Duggee forgets how to woof, Duggly comes to visit, Roly celebrates Potato Time, and Billy teaches everyone the Bugatron dance!

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep15
programme.desc: The Taj Mahal, India - The grimbots attach a bit of the Taj Mahal to GrimHQ. It remains to be seen whether the Go Jetters can fix the glitch.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Mount Etna, Italy - When Grandmaster Glitch makes popcorn in Mount Etna, Italy, he blocks the volcano and endangers farms on its slopes.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Table Mountain, South Africa - Glitch wants to ski, so the Grimbots give Table Mountain a snowy peak, which threatens its rare plants.

programme.title: My World Kitchen S3 Ep5
programme.desc: Aksara's Sri Lankan Fish Curry - Aksara's curry contains a very special ingredient: tamarind.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Andy and the Baby Humpback Whale - In this episode Andy, Jen and Scout head to the Pacific ocean, off the tropical islands of Hawaii, on a baby animal mission to see how a baby humpback whale prepares for its 5000 km migration North to the rich feeding grounds of Alaska.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S7 Ep12
programme.desc: Smart Parrot - Captain Captain, Sandy and Seaweed get a new 'Smart Parrot' to help make life easier around the Scarlet Squid. Unfortunately it only ends up making life harder for the pirates!

programme.title: Panda and Krash S1 Ep22
programme.desc: Football Fever - Krash finds a football somewhere and then he plays with it with He-He and Raccoon.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Spy Game - When Bingo stops playing Bluey's spy game, their grown-up controlling device stops working properly! Bluey now sees how important Bingo is and needs to win her back!

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Takeaway - Forced to wait five minutes in front of a restaurant for their takeaway, Bluey and Bingo become restless for entertainment, pushing the very limits of Dad's patience.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Butterflies - Playing 'Butterflies' in the backyard is great fun, until Bluey runs away with Judo leaving Bingo all alone. Now poor Bingo's heartbroken and Bluey needs to make amends.

programme.desc: Evil Pea Takes a Break - The Cobs try to capture Supertato while Evil Pea is on holiday, but it goes wrong, resulting in Evil Pea getting covered in flour and custard over in the Bath Product's Aisle.

programme.title: Biz Talk
programme.desc: A groundbreaking 30-minute interview show, giving an in-depth look into how top companies around the world conduct business and how policymakers view the fast-changing world economy. It presents 360 degree profiles of industry movers and shakers, tech mavericks and policymakers, and drills down on the stories behind their success, to give you clarity on what's happening in every facet of business.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The World Today is the core rolling service of CGTN. keep viewers up-to-date with all the world's top stories as they happen.

programme.title: Inheritors
programme.desc: Inheritors is a multi-media product from CGTN that shines a light on China's rich Intangible Cultural Heritage. Each 30-minute TV edition is hosted by a long-term expatriate in China who has a unique understanding of the country's culture. He or she will introduce viewers to people who are dedicating their lives to its protection, inheritance, innovation, development and promotion.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The World Today is the core rolling service of CGTN. keep viewers up-to-date with all the world's top stories as they happen.

programme.title: Africa Live

programme.title: Asia Today
programme.desc: Asia Today highlights the latest news and social developments across Asia. Correspondents in over a dozen countries report on the region's top stories as they happen.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and accepted wisdom to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won't find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes, instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today's world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from Prove That Climate Change Exists to Who Will Win the Race to Space. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk, Challenging perceptions.

programme.desc: Harz Mountains: German forest in transformation - The Harz Mountains are a popular holiday region with colourful half-timbered towns, mountains and forests. programme.title: Arts Unveiled
programme.desc: Arts Unveiled. Jos Rizal - How one man inspired a revolution - Who was Jos Protacio Rizal and why is he honored every December 30th on Rizal Day in the Philippines? Born in 1861 on the island of Luzon, Rizal was more than just a writer. He was a visionary reformer, a trained physician, and a fearless critic of Spanish colonial rule.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: YOKAI
programme.desc: The fox, or KITSUNE also holds an identity as a supernatural creature commonly depicted at shrines, known for its ability to masquerade as humans to deceive them, or to provide divine messages.

programme.title: Magical Japanese
programme.desc: The Japanese language is rich in words and expressions influenced by nature, history, and culture. This episode looks at words related to Go. Explore the unique culture behind them.

programme.title: MATSURI: The Heartbeat of Japan
programme.desc: Inami Shishimai is a type of lion dance performed in Toyama Prefecture. Adults play the role of the shishi while a child is the shishi-tori, whose job is to pacify the shishi with sacred objects.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE

programme.desc: Climate change continues, and heat is affecting crops. Some Japanese farmers are adjusting to compensate, like a citrus farmer growing subtropical fruits and a farm that generates solar power.

programme.title: BOSAI:Large-Scale Blackouts
programme.desc: A large-scale blackout is the total loss of power in an entire region. Hokkaido's 2018 blackout had a major impact on medical care and logistics. Find out the mechanisms and how it can be prevented.

programme.title: Pottery the Times Demand
programme.desc: Aichi / Kataoka Mami (curator) Tokoname, a pottery town with over 900 years of history, creates products appropriate for the times. Kataoka finds the beauty that's present in functional objects.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE

programme.title: Do the Oceans Hold the Key?

programme.title: BIZ STREAM
programme.desc: Giving a Spark to the Power Grid: This episode features strategies to maintain Japan's power grid. One company is recruiting climbers, and another created a mobile game for checking power poles.

programme.title: Let's Enjoy MATH
programme.desc: Numbler erases a part of a cake delivery memo, resulting in the delivery of four cakes instead of one. Barky solves the mystery by showing the difference between ordinal numbers and cardinal numbers.

programme.title: TAKE TECH

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE

programme.title: Train Cruise
programme.desc: We travel the JR Hakushin and Uetsu Lines of Niigata and Yamagata in search of traditional food culture in a major rice-producing region: sampling sake, fine salmon dishes and other culinary delights.

programme.title: Japanology Plus mini
programme.desc: Japan now has roughly 8.5 million vacant homes. We look at various initiatives that aim to address this issue, including renovating homes as investments or using them to revitalize local communities.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE

programme.title: YOKAI
programme.desc: The fox, or KITSUNE also holds an identity as a supernatural creature commonly depicted at shrines, known for its ability to masquerade as humans to deceive them, or to provide divine messages.

programme.title: Magical Japanese
programme.desc: The Japanese language is rich in words and expressions influenced by nature, history, and culture. This episode looks at words related to Go. Explore the unique culture behind them.

programme.title: MATSURI: The Heartbeat of Japan
programme.desc: Inami Shishimai is a type of lion dance performed in Toyama Prefecture. Adults play the role of the shishi while a child is the shishi-tori, whose job is to pacify the shishi with sacred objects.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE

programme.title: Ethical Every Day

programme.title: BOSAI:Large-Scale Blackouts

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC315MuhammadvsDellaMaddalena
programme.desc: When the Octagon returns to Montreal for the first time since 2015, fans are treated to a stacked card headlined by a championship doubleheader. In the main event, Belal Muhammad defends his welterweight crown for the first time against Australian powerhouse Jack Della Maddalena, and Manon Fiorot battles to be the first female French champion against Flyweight phenom Valentina Shevchenko. Plus, the return of Jose Aldo and much more on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep11
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep2
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC 321: Aspinall vs. Gane
programme.desc: Prelims - The UFC heavyweight world championship will be on the line on October 25 at Etihad Arena in Abu Dhabi when Tom Aspinall defends his undisputed crown for the first time against Ciryl Gane in the main event of UFC 321. Englands Aspinall has ended his last three wins by knockout, including an interim title-winning effort over Sergei Pavlovich and a successful defense against Curtis Blaydes. This fall, he will face another stern test in French star Gane, a former interim champ looking to add undisputed goal to his trophy case after back-to-back wins over Serghei Spivac and Alexander Volkov

programme.desc: When the Octagon returns to Montreal for the first time since 2015, fans are treated to a stacked card headlined by a championship doubleheader. Plus, the return of Jose Aldo and much more on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep11
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep2
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.
